recipe.title: Corn on the Cob with Chipotle-Scallion Butter
ingredients: 1 tablespoon minced seeded canned chipotle chiles in adobo
6 large ears of corn, shucked and halved
instructions: Stir together butter, scallions, chipotles, zest, and rounded 1/2 teaspoon salt in a large bowl.
Cook corn in a large pot of boiling water until crisp-tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Transfer with tongs to butter mixture and toss.
